title: The Sceptre and the mace
brief_description: During the 1957 opening of Canada’s 23rd parliament by Queen Elizabeth II, cameras record the ceremonies in the House of Commons and the Senate. They also bring to the screen many informal glimpses of the Queen and Prince Philip in residence at Government House.
